contents:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 29th day of June, 2015, the Application for Leave to File Original Process and the Petition for Extraordinary Relief and/or Habeas Corpus Relief are DISMISSED. See Commonwealth v. Reid, 537 Pa. 167, 642 A.2d 453 (1994) (providing that hybrid representation is improper). The Pro-thonotary is DIRECTED to forward the filings to counsel of record.
